statements: SELECT * FROM course_schedule WHERE instructor_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT course_id, course_name FROM course_schedule WHERE day_of_week = 'Monday';
SELECT course_name, instructor_name, start_time, end_time FROM course_schedule WHERE course_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM course_schedule WHERE start_time > '2023-01-01' AND end_time < '2023-03-01';
SELECT course_id, instructor_name, day_of_week FROM course_schedule WHERE course_name LIKE '%Math%';
SELECT course_id, course_name, instructor_name, start_time, end_time, day_of_week FROM course_schedule WHERE instructor_name = 'John Doe' ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT course_name, start_time, end_time, day_of_week, instructor_name FROM course_schedule WHERE day_of_week = 'Monday' ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT course_name, start_time, end_time, instructor_name FROM course_schedule WHERE start_time >= '2022-01-01' AND end_time <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY start_time ASC;

SELECT course_id, course_name, instructor_name, start_time, end_time, day_of_week FROM course_schedule WHERE day_of_week IN ('Monday', 'Wednesday', 'Friday') ORDER BY instructor_name ASC, start_time DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT course_name, COUNT(*) AS number_of_instances FROM course_schedule GROUP BY course_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY number_of_instances DESC;
SELECT * FROM Course;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Course ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT course_id, course_name, course_credits FROM Course WHERE course_credits > 3;
SELECT * FROM Timetable WHERE day_of_week = 'Monday';
SELECT course_name, start_time, end_time FROM Course JOIN Timetable ON Course.course_id = Timetable.course_id WHERE Timetable.room_id = 101;
SELECT course_name, course_credits FROM Course WHERE course_credits > 3;
SELECT * FROM Course ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT course_name, COUNT(*) AS total_courses FROM Course GROUP BY course_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT Timetable.day_of_week, Timetable.start_time, Timetable.end_time, Course.course_name FROM Timetable JOIN Course ON Timetable.course_id = Course.course_id;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Course WHERE course_description IS NOT NULL AND course_description <> '';
SELECT * FROM Course;
SELECT course_name, course_id FROM Course WHERE course_credit > 3;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM Student WHERE student_program = 'Computer Science';
SELECT course_name, schedule_date, schedule_time FROM Course JOIN Schedule ON Course.course_id = Schedule.course_id;

SELECT student_name, course_name, schedule_date FROM Student JOIN Schedule ON Student.student_id = Schedule.student_id JOIN Course ON Schedule.course_id = Course.course_id ORDER BY schedule_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Course WHERE course_credit > 3;
SELECT course_name, course_credit FROM Course WHERE course_credit BETWEEN 2 AND 5;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM Student WHERE student_program = 'Computer Science';
SELECT course_name, student_name, schedule_date, schedule_time FROM Course JOIN Schedule ON Course.course_id = Schedule.course_id JOIN Student ON Schedule.student_id = Student.student_id;
SELECT * FROM Course JOIN Schedule ON Course.course_id = Schedule.course_id WHERE Schedule.schedule_date = '2023-10-15';
SELECT * FROM course
SELECT course_name, course_credits FROM course
SELECT course_id, course_name, course_description FROM course
SELECT course_name FROM course WHERE course_credits > 3
SELECT * FROM course WHERE course_name LIKE 'Intro%'
SELECT course_id, course_name, course_description, course_credits FROM course WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, course_credits FROM course WHERE course_credits > 3 ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM course WHERE course_description LIKE '%programming%' ORDER BY course_name;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM course WHERE course_credits BETWEEN 2 AND 4 ORDER BY course_name, course_credits DESC;
SELECT course_id, course_name, course_credits FROM course WHERE course_description IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM course;
SELECT course_id, course_name FROM course WHERE course_credit > 3;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM student ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM timetable WHERE timetable_day = 'Monday' AND timetable_time > '09:00:00';
SELECT course_name, enrollment_status FROM course c, enrollment e WHERE c.course_id = e.enrollment_course_id AND e.enrollment_status = 'Enrolled';
SELECT * FROM course WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, course_credit FROM course WHERE course_credit > 3 ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT instructor_name, instructor_email, instructor_department FROM instructor WHERE instructor_department = 'Computer Science' ORDER BY instructor_name ASC;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM student WHERE student_email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT course_name, timetable_day, timetable_time FROM course JOIN timetable ON course.course_id = timetable.timetable_course_id ORDER BY timetable_day, timetable_time ASC;
